Class GridManager

  GridManager

public class GridManager
extends java.lang.Object

creates and updates the grid

Constructor Summary
GridManager(int numRows, int numCols)
          constructor creates a grid with the given inputs and gives it default starting values

          draws the grid

          gets the number of rows in the grid
 java.lang.String[][] setPosOnGrid(int posX, int posY, boolean isPlayer)
          sets a specified position on the grid to either X or O depending on whether or not it is to represent a player guess or the opponents guess
